sources.title: 500 MPH Storm | Full Action Disaster Movie | Casper Van Dien
sources.description:
500 MPH Storm - When an energy experiment goes haywire, a rash of massive hurricanes rips across North America. A scientist must get his family to safety before the hurricanes merge, creating a "hypercane" with the power to wipe America off the map.
2013.  Stars: Casper Van Dien, Michael Beach, Sarah Lieving

metadata.Plot: When an energy experiment goes haywire, a rash of massive hurricanes rips across North America. A special project scientist must get his family to safety before the hurricanes merge, creating a "hypercane" with the power to wipe the US off the map.
metadata.Actors: Casper Van Dien, Michael Beach, Sarah Lieving
